htmlEmbed:
Raycast - Supercharged productivity,Raycast AI4/24/2023

Raycast lets you control your tools with a few keystrokes. It's designed to keep you focused.,Unlock the power of AI on your Mac. Write smarter, code faster, and answer questions quicker

Read

data.htmlText:
StoreDeveloperTeamsAIBetaChangelogPricingBlog

Magic at your fingertips

Unlock the power of AI on your Mac. Write smarter, code faster, and answer questions quicker. Get more done in less time!

Your Mac just got smarter

Leverage Raycast’s integration with macOS to enjoy an entirely new layer of context that makes using AI across all your applications a breeze.

ChatGPT - Anytime, anywhere

Talk to AI without any interruptions. Designed for easy access from anywhere on your Mac, it’s the virtual assistant you’ve been looking for.

Accelerate tasks - No code required

Create AI commands to take your workflows to the next level. From rewriting text to generating fresh ideas. Just describe your task and let Raycast do the rest.

Unleash the full potential with our API

Use our new APIs to make your extensions smarter with the power of AI. Share them with your team or our community. It’s never been simpler to build AI experiences.

FAQs

Answers to the most frequently asked questions.

Ready for take-off?

Download the Raycast app and start taking your productivity to new heights.

Download for Mac
or$ brew install --cask raycast
macOS 11+
Stay up to date

We’d love to stay connected with you. If the feeling’s mutual, follow @raycastapp on Twitter for the latest news and updates.

Help shape the product

Lots of the best and brightest ideas come from you. Join our Slack Community to help create the future of Raycast.

Subscribe to our newsletter

Get a summary of what we’ve shipped during the last month, behind the scenes updates, and team picks.

Pure information and no spam. Unsubscribe any time

readabilityObject.title: Raycast AI
readabilityObject.content:
Magic at your fingertips

Unlock the power of AI on your Mac. Write smarter, code faster, and answer questions quicker. Get more done in less time!

Your Mac just got smarter

Leverage Raycast’s integration with macOS to enjoy an entirely new layer of context that makes using AI across all your applications a breeze.

ChatGPT - Anytime, anywhere

Talk to AI without any interruptions. Designed for easy access from anywhere on your Mac, it’s the virtual assistant you’ve been looking for.

Accelerate tasks - No code required

Create AI commands to take your workflows to the next level. From rewriting text to generating fresh ideas. Just describe your task and let Raycast do the rest.

Unleash the full potential with our API

Use our new APIs to make your extensions smarter with the power of AI. Share them with your team or our community. It’s never been simpler to build AI experiences.

FAQs

Answers to the most frequently asked questions.

Why is there a waitlist?

The waitlist allows us to control the rollout of Raycast AI. We work closely with early users to incorporate their feedback and ensure a high-quality experience with all AI-powered features.

Ready for take-off?

Download the Raycast app and start taking your productivity to new heights.

macOS 11+
readabilityObject.textContent: Magic at your fingertipsUnlock the power of AI on your Mac. Write smarter, code faster, and answer questions quicker. Get more done in less time!Your Mac just got smarterLeverage Raycast’s integration with macOS to enjoy an entirely new layer of context that makes using AI across all your applications a breeze.ChatGPT - Anytime, anywhereTalk to AI without any interruptions. Designed for easy access from anywhere on your Mac, it’s the virtual assistant you’ve been looking for.Accelerate tasks - No code requiredCreate AI commands to take your workflows to the next level. From rewriting text to generating fresh ideas. Just describe your task and let Raycast do the rest.Unleash the full potential with our APIUse our new APIs to make your extensions smarter with the power of AI. Share them with your team or our community. It’s never been simpler to build AI experiences.FAQsAnswers to the most frequently asked questions.Why is there a waitlist?The waitlist allows us to control the rollout of Raycast AI. We work closely with early users to incorporate their feedback and ensure a high-quality experience with all AI-powered features.How much do the AI features cost?During the beta phase, all AI features will be available for free. Afterwards, they will likely cost, as AI-generated content tends to be pricey.How do you handle my data?We value privacy and never collect any sensitive information. None of your inputs are recorded or used to train models. All Raycast AI features are powered by OpenAI's APIs.When are the AI features generally available?In short: When we addressed the initial user feedback. During the beta phase, we work with early users together to improve their workflows. We’ll continue to improve Raycast AI during the beta phase.Ready for take-off?Download the Raycast app and start taking your productivity to new heights.macOS 11+
